Interface Scene

All Known Implementing Classes:
Solar
public interface Scene

This is the interface that defines a scene. It is completely generic, meaning anyone can implement any scene with any math in it. The only speciffic function is the gravity related one. However, it isn't worth the trouble to change it.

Method Summary
 void camRoll(double a)
          Roll the camera in local space

public void frame(WinDesc w)
Tells the scene to draw itself. Scene should simply pass this on to idividual objects, after perhaps doing some housekeeping.
